body_html:
Thank you @yaroslavvb!
I implemented this and it works.
The challenge is that now model construction time is doubled! Is this expected?

This could be a deal breaker for complex models(for some reason my model construction time in GPU is more than CPU)

Any advise is appreciated.

body:
Thank you @yaroslavvb!
I implemented this and it works.
The challenge is that now model construction time is doubled! Is this expected?

This could be a deal breaker for complex models(for some reason my model construction time in GPU is more than CPU)

Any advise is appreciated.
